original_text: Jacob worked for seven years to have Rachel as his wife. But the years passed very quickly because Jacob loved Rachel very much. Seven years seemed like only a few days to Jacob.
korean_text: 야곱이 라헬을 위하여 칠 년 동안 라반을 섬겼으나 그를 사랑하는 까닭에 칠 년을 며칠 같이 여겼더라

sentences.original_text: to have Rachel as his wife
But the years passed very quickly
because Jacob loved Rachel very much
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 야곱은 라헬을 매우 사랑했기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: Seven years seemed like only a few days
